Spells-Primal -- Male Half-Orc Druid: 12
Strength: 16 (+3) Dexterity: 16 (+3) Constitution: 16 (+3) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 16 (+3) Charisma: 14 (+2)
Background: Acrobat Alignment: Lawful Good Deity: Sarenrae (NG)
Experience: 11474/12000 Level: 12 Speed: 25 Size: Medium
Ability Notes: Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 7; General: 3; Skill: 6 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Additional Lore (Cavern Lore); Additional Lore (Games Lore); Adopted Ancestry (Elf); Assurance (Diplomacy); Call Of The Wild; Cooperative Nature; Cooperative Soul; Experienced Professional; Fey Caller; Group Impression; Hobnobber; Order Explorer (Wild); Overwhelming Energy; Quick Squeeze; Reach Spell; Skill Training (Religion); Steady Spellcasting; Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd); Widen Spell Druid Features: Ability Boost (Wisdom); Ability Boosts; Alertness; Anathema; Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense); Druid Feats; Druid Skills; Druid Weapon Expertise; Druidic Language; Druidic Order; Expert Spellcaster; General Feats; Great Fortitude; Leaf; Lightning Reflexes; Perception Trained; Primal Spellcasting; Resolve; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Shield Block; Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Primal); Wild Empathy Acrobat Features: Ability Boost (Choose 1 from Dexterity, Strength; Choose 1 from any); Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Circus Lore); Steady Balance Human Features: Ability Boost (Choose 2 from any); Ancestry Feats; Half-Orc; Human Heritage
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 3 selections
Druid Feats: 6 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
General Feats: 3 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 6 selections
Adopted Ancestry (Elf): May take Elf ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic orders
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Order Explorer (Wild): May learn Wild order feats
Perception: +19 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +17 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +16 (charisma; trained) Occultism: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Forest Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained)
Athletics: +3 (strength; untrained) Games Lore: +21 (intelligence; master) Religion: +17 (wisdom; trained)
Baking Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +16 (charisma; trained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Cavern Lore: +21 (intelligence; master) Legal Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +3 (dexterity; untrained)
Circus Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Library Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Crafting: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +17 (wisdom; trained) Tea Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Notes:

Additional Lore (Games Lore): Skill Master (Games Lore)
Alertness: Perception Expert
Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 5 from any)
Druidic Language: Knows a druid-specific language
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Leaf: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 5 from any)
Skill Training (Religion): Skill Trained (Religion)
Assurance (Diplomacy): May forgo rolling a Diplomacy check for an automatic 24
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures when using Aid with expert skills are successes
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures; normal failures give twice the income
Group Impression: May use Diplomacy to Make an Impression with 2 targets
Hobnobber: May Gather Information in half normal time
Quick Squeeze: May Squeeze 5'/rd, or 10'/rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: All Balance successes are critical successes/Never flat-footed during Balance/May use Acrobatics to Grab an Edge
Wild Empathy: May use Diplomacy with animals to Make an Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 140 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Blowgun (+19 1 P R20'; dexterity; expert); Mace (+19 1d6+3 B; strength; expert); Sickle (+19 1d4+3 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +36
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Druid Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Halberd): Treats Halberd as one category simpler
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +19 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +19 (dexterity; expert); Will: +21 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: P0: 5; P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; P6: 3 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Primal: +19 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Primal: 29 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Aberrant Whispers (P3 Enc): (1) 5' emanation (2/3 actions give a 10'/15' emanation) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases radius by 5')
Abyssal Wrath (P5 Evo): (2) 60' cone inflicts 4d6 HP of random type: bludgeoning and electricity; acid and slashing; bludgeoning and cold; fire and piercing (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Acid Arrow (P2 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 3d8 HP acid (critical success inflicts double HP) plus 1d6 HP persistent acid (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 HP initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Acid Splash (P0 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid (critical success also inflicts 1 HP persistent acid) and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+3 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+3 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+3 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+3 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Aerial Form (P4 Tra): (2) Caster becomes choice of a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, AC 30, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific feaures for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Athletics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, AC 33, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Athletics)
Air Bubble (P1 Con): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Air Walk (P4 Tra): (2) Touched may walk up to a 45-degree angle on air for 5 min
Alarm (P1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers choice of mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr
Ancestral Memories (P1 Div): (1) Caster becomes trained in choice of non-Lore or ancestral Lore skill for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes expert in chosen skill)
Angelic Halo (P1 Abj): (1) 15' emanation increases the effects of Heal by double the Heal spell's level
Angelic Wings (P3 Evo): (2) Caster may fly at full Speed and casts a 30' radius bright light for 3 rd (heightened 5th effects last 1 min)
Animal Form (P2 Tra): (2) Caster becomes choice of Medium animal with 5 temporary HP, AC 28, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 3rd gives 10 temporary HP, AC 29, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, AC 30, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, AC 30, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Animal Messenger (P2 Enc): (1 min) R120' Target Tiny animal carries a small object or note to a specified destination for up to 24 hr
Animal Vision (P3 Div): (1 min) R120' Caster can share target animal's senses (save Will negates) for 1 hr
Ant Haul (P1 Tra): (2) Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr
Arcane Countermeasure (P5 Abj): (R) R120' Reduces target spell's level by 1 if heightened and gives that spell's targets +2 saves, skill checks, AC, and DC against it
Baleful Polymorph (P6 Tra): (2) R30' Transforms target into a harmless animal for 1 min (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure extends transformation indefinitely, repeating save each rd)
Banishment (P5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on caster; critical failure prevents target return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Barkskin (P2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min (heightened +2 +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
Blindness (P3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure makes blindness permanent)
Burning Hands (P1 Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Cataclysm (P10 Evo): (2) R1000' 60' burst inflicts 3d10 HP each acid, bludgeoning three times, cold, electricity, and fire, ignoring resistance 10 (save basic Reflex)
Celestial Brand (P5 Nec): (1) R30' Caster and allies gain +1 attacks and skill checks vs. evil target, and attacks by good creatures inflict +1d4 HP good (heightened +2 good creature attacks inflict +1 HP good)
Chain Lightning (P6 Evo): (2) R500' Inflicts 8d12 HP electricity to a chain of targets, jumping up to 30' between each (save basic Reflex; critical save ends chain) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Charm (P1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly (save Will negates; critical success target notices spell; critical failure makes target helpful)
Cloudkill (P5 Nec): (3) R120' Cloud moves 10' away from caster each rd, inflicting 6d8 HP poison each rd to creatures within (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Cone Of Cold (P5 Evo): (2) R60' cone inflicts 12d6 HP cold (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Continual Flame (P2 Evo): (3) Touched object glows as a torch until dismissed
Control Water (P5 Evo): (2) R500' Raises or lowers water in a 50'x50' area by 10'

Create Water (P1 Con): (2) R0' Creates 2 gallons of water that remains for 1 day

Detect Poison (P1 Div): (2) R30' Reveals whether the target creature or object is venomous or poisoned (heightened 2nd reveals the number and types of poison)

Dragon Form (P6 Tra): (2) Caster becomes choice of Large dragon with 10 temporary HP, AC 30, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th Huge creature with +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, AC 33, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)

Earthquake (P8 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts difficult terrain, -2 attacks, AC, and skill checks, 40' fall (save Reflex negates), and structure collapse that inflicts 11d6B HP (save Reflex inflicts half HP and prone; critical success inflicts half HP; critical failure inflicts 40' fall)
Eclipse Burst (P7 Nec): (2) R500' 60' burst blocks magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP negative to living creatures (save basic Reflex; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP negative)

Fiery Body (P7 Tra): (2) Caster gains fire immunity and resistance 10 to precision damage, suffers weakness 5 to cold and water, inflicts 3d6 HP fire to unarmed attackers, gains +1d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks and an additional die of damage on fire spells, may cast Produce Flame as an innate spell, gains a 40' fly Speed, and does not need to breathe for 1 min (heightened 9th inflicts 4d6 HP fire to unarmed attackers, inflicts +2d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks, and increases fly Speed to 60')

Gust Of Wind (P1 Evo): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6B HP)

Jealous Hex (P1 Nec): (1) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, drained 1, or stupefied 1, based on target's highest ability modifier, until target saves up to 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts condition level 2)
Jump (P1 Tra): (1) Caster may jump 30' (heightened 3rd affects creature touched and lasts for 1 min)
Know Direction (P0 Div): (2) Caster knows which direction is north (heightened 7th gives direction to a familiar location)
Light (P0 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily preparations (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lightning Bolt (P3 Evo): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP) (save basic Reflex)
Longstrider (P1 Tra): (2) Caster gains +10' Speed for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last 8 hr)
Magic Fang (P1 Tra): (2) Gives touched creature's unarmed attack +1 attack and 2 damage dice
Mariner's Curse (P5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on the open sea, until curse is removed (save Will inflicts sickened 1 until condition is reduced; critical success negates; critical success inflicts sickened 2)
Mask Of Terror (P7 Ill): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Massacre (P9 Nec): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP negative on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 negative on all within line (save Fort inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Meld Into Stone (P3 Tra): (2) Caster may enter touched stone, retaining the ability to hear outside sounds, for 10 min
Mending (P1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd affects a 1 Bulk object; 3rd affects a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Meteor Swarm (P9 Evo): (2) R500' 4 meteors inflict 6d10B HP in 1 10' burst and 14d6 HP fire in a 40' burst (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10B HP and +2d6 HP fire)
Moment Of Renewal (P8 Nec): (2) 6 touched instantly gain the effects of 24 hr of rest
Monstrosity Form (P8 Tra): (2) Caster transforms into choice of a Huge phoenix, purple worm, or sea serpent with 20 temporary HP, AC 32, +28 attack, darkvision, +30 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 9th 25 temporary HP, AC 34, +31 attack, an additional damage die, +33 Athletics)
Moon Frenzy (P5 Tra): (2) R30' 5 willing targets gain 5 temporary HP, +10' Speed, fangs and claws that inflict 2d6P HP and 2d6S HP plus 1d4 HP persistent bleed on a critical hit, and increase a size up to Large in full moonlight, but suffer weakness 5 to silver, for 1 min (heightened 6th 10 temporary HP, inflict 3d6P HP and 3d6S HP, weakness 10 to silver; 10th 20 temporary HP, inflict 4d6P HP and 4d6S HP, weakness 20 to silver)
Nature Incarnate (P10 Tra): (2) Caster transforms into choice of a Medium green man or a Gargantuan kaiju with 30 temporary HP, AC 37, +34 attack, darkvision, +36 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min
Nature's Enmity (P9 Enc): (2) R120' 5 targets in a 500' burst suffer -10' Speed, attacks from animals that inflict 2d10S HP and flat-footed (DC 8 flat negates; save basic Reflex), a required DC 5 flat check to cast primal spells, and hostility from any bonded animal, fungus, and plant for 10 min
Negate Aroma (P1 Abj): (2) Negates scent of willing touched for 1 hr (heightened 5th R30' affects 10 targets)
Neutralize Poison (P3 Nec): (2) Allows a counteract check against 1 poison affecting touched
Nondetection (P3 Abj): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Obscuring Mist (P2 Con): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (P1 Abj): (2) Raises DC to Track caster by 4 or up to spell DC for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last 8 hr; 4th effects last 8 hr and affect a 20' area and 10 creatures)
Passwall (P5 Con): (2) Creates a 5'x10'x10' tunnel in wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr (heightened 7th tunnel extends 20', appears as normal wall, and can be entered only using a password or trigger)
Pest Form (P1 Tra): (2) Caster becomes choice of Tiny animal with AC 27, 20' Speed, low-light vision, R30' imprecise scent, +10 Athletics and Stealth modifiers, and weakness 5 to physical damage for 10 min (heightened 4th gives 20' fly Speed)
Phantom Steed (P2 Con): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (AC 20, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can only be ridden by designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 4th mount has 60' Speed and can move normally over water and natural difficult terrain; 5th mount may also Air Walk for 1 rd; 6th mount has an 80' Speed and may fly)
Plane Shift (P7 Con): (10 min) Shifts caster and 8 willing targets to a different plane
Plant Form (P5 Tra): (2) Caster transforms into choice of Large plant with 12 temporary HP, AC 31, +27 attack, +11 damage, low-light vision, resistance 10 to poison, +19 Athletics modifier, and plant-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 6th Huge plant with +5' reach, 24 temporary HP, AC 34, +21 attack, +16 damage, +22 Athletics)
Polar Ray (P8 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 10d8 HP cold (double on critical success) and drained 2 (heightened +1 inflicts +2d8 HP)
Prestidigitation (P0 Evo): (2) R10' Performs choice of cooking, lifting, make a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Primal Herd (P10 Tra): (2) R30' Caster and 5 willing targets transform into Huge mammoths with 20 temporary HP, 40' Speed, low-light vision, AC 34, a tusk attack that inflicts 4d8+19P HP, a trunk attack that inflicts 4d6+16B HP, a foot attack that inflicts 4d6+16B HP, low-light vision, resistance 10 to poison, +30 Athletics modifier, and a trample action for 1 min
Primal Phenomenon (P10 Div): (3) Duplicates the effects of a known spell up to 9th level or of a common spell of up to 7th level
Primal Summons (P6 Con): (F) Subsequent Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus gives summoned creature choice of: 60' fly Speed; 20' burrow speed and -10' Speed; +1d6 HP fire damage, resistance 10 to fire, and weakness 5 to cold and water; 60' swim Speed, Shove after melee attack, and resistance 5 to fire
Produce Flame (P0 Evo): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP fire (double HP plus 1d4 persistent fire damage on critical success) (heightened +1 +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Punishing Winds (P8 Evo): (3) R100' 30' radius drags down flying creatures 40', creates greater difficult terrain for flying creatures and those trying to exit, and creates difficult terrain for others while sustained up to 1 min
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Nec): (2) Removes contaminates from 1 cubic foot of food or water
Purple Worm Sting (P6 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 3d6P HP, enfeebled 2, and 3d6 HP poison, increasing to 4d6 HP and 6d6 HP on failed saves (save Fortitude inflicts 3d6P HP and 3d6 HP poison only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2 immediately)
Ray Of Frost (P0 Evo): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP cold (critical success inflicts double damage and -10 Speed for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Read Aura (P0 Div): (1 min) R30' Caster detects whether target object is magical and the related school of magic (heightened 3rd affects 10 objects; 6th affects unlimited objects)
Regenerate (P7 Nec): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage deactivates for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Remake (P10 Con): (1 hr) Fully re-creates a known object up to 5' cu
Remove Disease (P3 Nec): (10 min) Allows a counteract attempt on 1 disease affecting touched
Remove Fear (P2 Enc): (2) Allows a counteract attempt vs. a single fear effect affecting touched target (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Remove Paralysis (P2 Nec): (2) Allows a counteract attempt vs. a single paralysis effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Resist Energy (P2 Abj): (2) Touched target gains resistance 5 vs. chosen energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Restoration (P2 Nec): (1 min) Gives choice of: reduce a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition affecting touched by 2, reduce two of these conditions by 1 each, or reduce a toxin affecting touched by 1 stage (heightened 4th reduce drained condition, lessen a toxin by 2 stages, or reduce a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th reduce a permanent doomed condition)
Restore Senses (P2 Nec): (2) Allows a counteract attempt vs. a magical blindness or deafness effect affecting touched
Revival (P10 Nec): (2) 30' radius restores 10d8+40 HP and raises dead with the same number of temporary HP while sustained up to 1 min
Searing Light (P3 Evo): (2) R120' Ranged spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP fire, plus 5d6 HP good to fiends and undead (critical success inflicts double HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Shape Stone (P4 Tra): (2) Reshapes touched 10'x10'x10' stone
Shape Wood (P2 Tra): (2) Reshapes touched 20 cubic feet of wood
Shapechange (P9 Tra): (2) Replicates any known polymorph spell of up to 8th level
Shatter (P2 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d10 HP sonic on an unattended target object, ignoring Hardness up to 4 (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and ignores +2 Hardness)
Shillelagh (P1 Tra): (2) Touched staff gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice (3 damage dice vs. aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead) for 1 min
Shocking Grasp (P1 Evo): (2) Touch inflicts 2d12 HP electricity; +1 attack and 1d4 HP persistent damage vs. an armored foe (heightened +1 +1d12 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Shrink (P2 Tra): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Tiny for 5 min (heightened 6th affects 10 creatures)
Sigil (P0 Tra): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on touched for 1 week or until scrubbed off (heightened 3rd effects last 1 month; 5th effects last 1 year; 7th effects are permanent)
Slow (P3 Tra): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2)
Solid Fog (P4 Con): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures and inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min
Speak With Animals (P2 Div): (2) Allows caster to communicate with animals for 10 min
Speak With Plants (P4 Div): (2) Allows caster to communicate with plants for 10 min
Spider Climb (P2 Tra): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Spider Sting (P1 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4P HP, 1d4 HP poison, and enfeebled 1, increasing to enfeebled 2 on failed saves (save Fortitude inflicts 1d4P HP and 1d4 HP poison only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2 immediately)
Stabilize (P0 Nec): (2) R30' Removes dying condition from target
Status (P2 Div): (2) Caster knows touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily preparations (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Stinking Cloud (P3 Con): (2) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures and inflicts sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1)
Stone To Flesh (P6 Tra): (2) Restores touched petrified creature or transforms a human-sized stone object into flesh
Stoneskin (P4 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 to non-adamantine physical damage for 20 min; each hit reduces duration by 1 min (heightened 6th gives resistance 10; 8th gives resistance 15; 10th gives resistance 20)
Storm Lord (P9 Evo): (2) 100' emanation produces the effects of choice of calm, foggy (conceals), rainy (-2 Acrobatics and Perception), or windy (-4 ranged attacks, flying suffers difficult terrain) weather, plus a bolt of lighting that inflicts 10d6 HP electricity each rd (save basic Reflex), while sustained up to 1 min
Storm Of Vengeance (P9 Evo): (3) R800' 360' burst inflicts -4 ranged attacks, greater difficult terrain for flying, and choice each rd of 4d8 HP acid (no save), 4d10B HP (save basic Fortitude), 7d6 HP electricity (save basic Reflex), difficult terrain and concealment, or deafened for 10 min (save Fortitude negates) while sustained up to 1 min (heightened 10th R2200' 1000' burst)
Stormwind Flight (P4 Tra): (2) Caster gains fly Speed equal to Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th flying against the wind does not inflict difficult terrain effects)
Summon Animal (P1 Con): (3) Level -1 creature appears and fights for caster while sustained up to 1 min (heightened 2nd level 1 creature; 3rd level 2 creature; 4th level 3 creature; 5th level 5 creature; 6th level 7 creature; 7th level 9 creature; 8th level 11 creature; 9th level 13 creature; 10th level 15 creature)
Summon Elemental (P2 Con): (3) Level -1 elemental appears and fights for caster while sustained up to 1 min (heightened 2nd level 1 elemental; 3rd level 2 elemental; 4th level 3 elemental; 5th level 5 elemental; 6th level 7 elemental; 7th level 9 elemental; 8th level 11 elemental; 9th level 13 elemental; 10th level 15 elemental)
Summon Fey (P1 Con): (3) Level -1 fey appears and fights for caster while sustained up to 1 min (heightened 2nd level 1 fey; 3rd level 2 fey; 4th level 3 fey; 5th level 5 fey; 6th level 7 fey; 7th level 9 fey; 8th level 11 fey; 9th level 13 fey; 10th level 15 fey)
Summon Giant (P5 Con): (3) Level 5 giant appears and fights for caster while sustained up to 1 min (heightened 6th level 7 giant; 7th level 9 giant; 8th level 11 giant; 9th level 13 giant; 10th level 15 giant)
Summon Plant Or Fungus (P1 Con): (3) Level -1 plant or fungus appears and fights for caster while sustained up to 1 min (heightened 2nd level 1 creature; 3rd level 2 creature; 4th level 3 creature; 5th level 5 creature; 6th level 7 creature; 7th level 9 creature; 8th level 11 creature; 9th level 13 creature; 10th level 15 creature)
Sunburst (P7 Evo): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts 8d10 HP fire plus 8d10 HP positive to undead (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP fire and positive)
Swamp Of Sloth (P3 Con): (1) R120' 5' burst (10'/15' burst for 2/3 actions) inflicts difficult terrain and 1d6 HP poison for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +2 +5' radius inflicts +1d6 HP)
Tanglefoot (P0 Con): (2) R30' Ranged attack inflicts -10' Speed for 1 rd (Escape negates; critical success inflicts immobilized for 1 rd) (heightened 2nd effects last for 2 rd; 4th effects last for 1 min)
Tangling Creepers (P6 Con): (3) R500' 40' burst inflicts -10' Speed and immobilizes 1 target for 1 rd each rd (Escape negates) for 10 min
Tempest Surge (P1 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity, clumsy 2 for 1 rd, and 1 persistent electricity (save Reflex inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP)
Tentacular Limbs (P1 Tra): (1) Extends caster reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10', and adding another action to touch spells extends reach to 20', for 1 min (heightened +2 adding another action extends touch spell reach to 30')
Tree Shape (P2 Tra): (2) Caster becomes a Large tree with AC 20 for 8 hr
Tree Stride (P5 Con): (1 min) Caster teleports from an adjacent to tree to another of the same species within 5 miles (heightened 6th teleports 50 miles; 8th teleports 500 miles; 9th teleports anywhere on the planet)
True Seeing (P6 Div): (2) R60' Allows caster to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Undeath's Blessing (P1 Nec): (1) Touched gains undead responses to Heal and Harm for 1 min, and Harm restores +2 HP (save Will Heal and Harm have half effect; critical success negates) (heightened +1 Harm restores +2 HP)
Unfettered Pack (P7 Abj): (2) R30' 10 targets ignore environmental difficult terrain and circumstance Speed penalties for 1 hr (heightened 9th ignores environmental greater difficult terrain)
Unusual Anatomy (P5 Tra): (1) Caster gains darkvision and resistance 10 to precision and critical damage and inflicts 2d6 HP acid on non-reach melee attackers for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistances and inflicts +1d6 HP acid)
Veil (P4 Ill): (2) Up to 10 creatures appear as different, similar creatures for 1 hr (heightened 5th also disguises voices and scents; 7th targets may appear as specific individuals)
Ventriloquism (P1 Ill): (2) Caster may project voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last 1 hr; allows changing voice quality and requires an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vital Beacon (P4 Nec): (1 min) Touch heals once each rd for 4 rd: 4d10 HP, 4d8HP, 4d6HP, then 4d4 HP (heightened +1 restores +1 die each rd)
Volcanic Eruption (P7 Evo): (2) R120' 5' radius inflicts 14d6 HP fire, -10' Speed, clumsy 1, and difficult terrain to flying creatures (save basic Reflex), plus 3d6 HP fire to creatures within 5' (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP and +1d6 HP within 5')
Wall Of Fire (P4 Evo): (3) R120' 5'x60'x10' line or 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Ice (P5 Evo): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x10'x1' wall or 10' radius hemisphere of ice with AC 10, Hardness 10, weakness to fire 15, and 40 HP per 10' section for 1 min; rubble inflicts 2d6 HP cold and difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +10 HP and rubble inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Stone (P5 Con): (3) R120' Creates a permanent 120'x20'x1" stone wall with AC 10, Hardness 14, and 50 HP per 10' section; rubble inflicts difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +15 HP)
Wall Of Thorns (P3 Con): (3) R60' Creates a 60'x10'x5' bramble wall with AC 10, Hardness 10, and 20 HP per 10' section that inflicts difficult terrain and 3d4P HP for 1 min (heightened +1 each section gains +5 HP and inflicts +1d4 HP)
Wall Of Wind (P3 Evo): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30'x5' wind wall that blocks small ammunition, inflicts -2 attack on larger ammunition, inflicts difficult terrain, and blocks flying creatures for 1 min (save Fortitude (flying creature) may pass as difficult terrain; critical success negates; critical failure pushes back 10')
Water Breathing (P2 Tra): (1 min) R30' 5 targets may breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily preparations)
Water Walk (P2 Tra): (2) Touched may walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures and effects last 1 hr)
Weapon Storm (P4 Evo): (2) Weapon swing inflicts 4 dice of damage in a 30' cone or 10' emanation (save basic Reflex; critical failure also inflicts critical specialization effect) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 damage die)
Web (P2 Con): (3) R30' 10' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 rd (save Reflex or Athletics negates for 1 action; critical success negates for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd or until Escape; Athletics also clears squares upon leaving)
Wild Morph (P1 Tra): (1) Caster gains choice of claws that inflict 1d6S HP, jaws that inflict 1d8P HP, resistance 5 to critical hits and precision damage, 10' reach, or 30' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th may choose two effects, and claws and jaws inflict 2d6 HP persistent bleed and 2d6 HP persistent poison; 10th may choose three effects, and claws and jaws inflict 4d6 HP persistent bleed and 4d6 HP persistent poison)
Wild Shape (P1 Tra): (2) Transforms caster into a pest for 10 min or another creature for 1 min, gaining +2 attacks (heightened 2nd may transform into an animal form)
Wind Walk (P8 Tra): (10 min) Caster and 5 creatures become clouds and move 20 MPH for 8 hr; attacks or spellcasting ends
You're Mine (P5 Enc): (2) R30' inflicts stunned 1 for 1 rd and allows caster to direct 1 target action (save Will inflicts stunned only; critical success negates; critical failure allows control for 1 rd) (heightened 7th controls for 1 rd; critical failure allows control for 1 min or until save)
Magic Notes:
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Fey Caller: Knows the Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object, Illusory Scene, and Veil primal spells
Leaf: Knows the Goodberry spell/+1 Focus Points
Call Of The Wild: May spend 10 min to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same level
Overwhelming Energy: (1) May cast a spell that ignores resistance 12 to choice of energy
Primal Spellcasting: May learn spells from the primal tradition
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
